WorkItem.Description:
On some computers it behaves ordinary while on others, it loads QuickGraph.dll (I make BidirectionalGraph), but  throws on calculating WeaklyConnectedComponents algorhytm on bidirectional graph:


"....at QuickGraph.Algorithms.Search.DepthFirstSearchAlgorithm`2..ctor(IAlgorithmComponent host, IVertexListGraph`2 visitedGraph, IDictionary`2 colors)
   at QuickGraph.Algorithms.Search.DepthFirstSearchAlgorithm`2..ctor(IVertexListGraph`2 visitedGraph)
   at QuickGraph.Algorithms.ConnectedComponents.WeaklyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm`2.InternalCompute()
   at QuickGraph.Algorithms.AlgorithmBase`1.Compute()".
WorkItem.Summary: WeaklyConnectedComponentsAlgorithm on calling Compute() behaves differently on different machines
